E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 9/15/1982
Subject: Freddy Mederos injured
Hello Manager,
he had a little fight in a bar, and got knocked out.
Diagnosis: Knocked Out Teeth.
He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take 4 days.

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Monday, 9/29/1982
Subject: Progress of William Eyman
Dear Sir,
William Eyman is doing pretty good at AA Sticky Wicketts!
He has an ERA of 2.86, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
